content: I think this may belong here. @Charles Lew made a pr to add the licensing field : https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73530 (just leaving it here :P )
yep this seems fine from a "raw" perspective but would appreciate sign-off from someone who can confirm this is the right thing (or point out pitfalls that someone should check for)
ping from triage: this PR is marked as waiting-on-team
Not entirely sure those fields are accurate in every case; some of those crates are designed to link in code that isn't under that license.

So what can i do to push this forwards? I also wonder if i split this PR into several PRs that each deals with libraries and compilers , do it make it viable to let t-compiler and t-libs to accept the PRs separately...
No, this is blocked on a t-core evaluation, not compiler or library work. I believe there might be some movement in the next several weeks, but core is quite busy right now (as always).
